Package classes

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
classes.Person
classes.Teacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Teacher extends Person implements Serializable
Represents a teacher, extending the Person class. This class includes teacher-specific attributes such as teacher ID, subject taught, and a timetable. It provides functionality to manage these attributes.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Teacher

      public Teacher()
      Default constructor. Initializes a teacher with default values and generates a unique teacher ID.

    • Teacher

      public Teacher(String name, String gender, String address, LocalDate birthday, int teacherID)
      Constructs a teacher with specified personal details. Automatically generates a unique teacher ID.
      Parameters:
      name - The teacher's name.
      gender - The teacher's gender.
      address - The teacher's address.
      birthday - The teacher's birthday.
